TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Figure extends System.Windows.Documents.AnchoredBlock

summary.span: 一个内联级别的用于承载图形的流内容元素。

span.span: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.

summary.span: 图形是带有位置属性的流内容的一部分，可以独立于 中的主内容流自定义该部分。

span.span: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息内容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 或元素通常用于突出显示或强调部分内容，到主机的支持图像或其他内容中的主要内容流，或用于插入松散相关如播发的内容。 or elements are often used to highlight or accentuate portions of content, to host supporting images or other content within the main content flow, or to inject loosely related content such as advertisements. 和有几个方面存在不同，并且可用于不同的情形。 and differ in several ways and are used for different scenarios. **Figure：****Figure:** - 可定位：可设置其水平和垂直定位点，以便相对于页面、内容、栏或段落进行停靠。Can be positioned: You can set its horizontal and vertical anchors to dock it relative to the page, content, column or paragraph. 你还可以使用其和属性以指定任意偏移量。You can also use its and properties to specify arbitrary offsets. - 大小可调整到多个列： 你可以设置高度和宽度为页面、 内容或栏的高度或宽度的倍数。Is sizable to more than one column: You can set height and width to multiples of page, content or column height or width. 请注意，对于页面和内容，倍数不能大于 1。Note that in the case of page and content, multiples greater than 1 are not allowed. 例如，你可以设置的宽度"0.5 页"或"0.25 内容"或"列 2"。For example, you can set the width of a to be "0.5 page" or "0.25 content" or "2 Column". 还可将高度和宽度设置为绝对像素值。You can also set height and width to absolute pixel values. - 不分页： 如果中的内容不适合在，它会呈现能够容纳的内容，且其余内容都将丢失Does not paginate: If the content inside a does not fit inside the , it will render whatever content does fit and the remaining content is lost **Floater：****Floater:** - 无法定位，可在能够为其提供空间的任何位置呈现。Cannot be positioned and will render wherever space can be made available for it. 无法设置的偏移量或定位点。You cannot set the offset or anchor a . - 无法调整到多个列： 默认情况下，位于一个列的大小。Cannot be sized to more than one column: By default, sizes at one column. 它具有属性可设置为绝对像素值，但如果此值大于它将被忽略的一个列宽度并将浮动对象大小为一个列。It has a property that can be set to an absolute pixel value, but if this value is greater than one column width it is ignored and the floater is sized at one column. 你可以调整其到小于一列大小通过设置正确的像素宽度，但大小不是列相关，因此"0.5 倍栏宽"不是有效的表达式宽度。You can size it to less than one column by setting the correct pixel width, but sizing is not column-relative, so "0.5Column" is not a valid expression for width. 已将没有高度属性，它是高度不能进行设置，它的高度取决于的内容 has no height property and it's height cannot be set, it’s height depends on the content - 对进行分页： 如果在其指定宽度其内容扩展到多个列的高度，浮标会断开，并显示到下一列、 下一个页面，等等。 paginates: If its content at its specified width extends to more than 1 column height, floater breaks and paginates to the next column, the next page, etc. 最好将独立内容放想要控制的大小和定位，并确信内容将放在指定的大小。 is a good place to put standalone content where you want to control the size and positioning, and are confident that the content will fit in the specified size. 是要放置自由流动更多内容流动相似的主页面内容，但与它分开的一个好。 is a good place to put more free-flowing content that flows similar to the main page content, but is separated from it. ## Examples 下面的示例定义，其中同时包含和元素。The following example defines a that contains both and elements. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： Floater 和图 FlowDocument 中](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "屏幕快照： Floater 和图 FlowDocument 中")![Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanDelayPlacement { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此图形是否可延迟放入内容流中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this figure can delay its placement in the flow of content.

value.span: **true**如果此图可以延迟放置; 否则为**false**。

span.span: **true** if this figure can delay placement; otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **true**.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 沿水平方向从其基线偏移的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction.

value.span: 沿水平方向从其基线偏移的距离（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction, in device independent pixels.
The default value is **0.0**.
